title: Hatim
overview: Hatim is an Indian television series that originally aired on STAR Plus channel in 2003-4. It is about an Arab prince Hatim Tai, a pre-Islamic Christian from Yemen and the father of Adi bin Hatim and Safana bint Hatim who was the companions of the Prophet Muhammad, Hatim has to solve seven questions to defeat the evil sorcerer lord Dajjal aided by Najumi. It has elements of fantasy. It was started by director Sagar, based on one of Jeetendra's films Hatimtai.
